properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Green Bay North of line from Cedar River MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 21 at 10:37AM EST until January 23 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
waves 3 to 6 feet occurring.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI, Green Bay North
of line from Cedar River MI to Rock Island Passage and 5NM
East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THURSDAY
